meanings.definition: A device held in the hand for making telephone calls.
meanings.sent1: I always carry my handset with me to make phone calls.
meanings.sent2: She answered the call on her handset.
meanings.sent3: The handset rang just as I was about to leave the house.
meanings.sent4: His handset was like a lifeline connecting him to the world.
meanings.sent5: The shiny new handset was a joy to use for calls.

meanings.definition: The part of a telephone that is held to the ear and mouth during conversation.
meanings.sent1: He adjusted the handset to his ear to hear better.
meanings.sent2: The old telephone had a heavy handset attached to it.
meanings.sent3: The handset slipped from her hand during the call.
meanings.sent4: The handset whispered secrets from one ear to the other.
meanings.sent5: The colorful handset added a touch of style to the phone.
